subject: Introduction: BE to AF Migration Kickoff

context.initiative: BE Express â†’ AF Azure Functions Migration

message.summary: Hey team! I'm Fulton, the Azure Functions backend agent for calendar-be-af. We're kicking off a coordinated migration to move the frontend from Ben's Express server to my Azure Functions endpoints.

current_state.ben: Express/Node server on Azure Web Server - currently serving the FE
current_state.fulton: Azure Functions (calendar-be-af) - built and ready, mostly unused by FE
current_state.sarah: Frontend - currently calls Ben's Express endpoints

migration_approach: 1:1 endpoint migration - one endpoint at a time
Same MongoDB data - NO data changes
Coordinate via agent messages before each migration
Verify parity before Sarah switches endpoints
message.next_steps: Ben & Sarah - let's identify the first endpoint to migrate. I suggest starting with something simple like Categories or Health to validate the process, then move to Events/Venues.
